messages.title: Polling Data
messages.content: The election in Brecon and Radnorshire is between the Conservative and the Liberal Democrats. From the analysis I’ve done, the data gives us a good idea of the choice people face on Thursday 12th December.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Best for Britain shows that nearly 200 seats across the UK could be decided by Remainers voting tactically for the Liberal Democrats.
Whether the Conservative or the Liberal Democrat wins will come down to how many Labour supporters lend their vote to the Liberal Democrats.
The Liberal Democrats have the best chance to win seats from the Conservatives, keeping them from a majority. But only if enough Labour supporters back the Lib Dems this time.

mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: Conservatives, Labour supporters, Green Party standing aside
mentions.tacticalSituation: Remainers voting tactically for the Liberal Democrats, nearly 200 seats across the UK could be decided by tactical voting.

issues.brexitEurope: You know from previous elections that a vote for anyone other the Liberal Democrats can end up with an MP who backs Brexit.
issues.government: Tactical voting, polling data, election analysis.
issues.labourEmployment: Labour supporters lend their vote to the Liberal Democrats.

community.content: The tactical website from Best for Britain shows nearly 200 seats across the UK could be decided by Remainers voting tactically for the Liberal Democrats.

quotes.text: I take polls seriously, having earned my living by cutting through the spin to see what the data really says.
You know from previous elections that a vote for anyone other the Liberal Democrats can end up with an MP who backs Brexit.

examples: Best for Britain shows that nearly 200 seats across the UK could be decided by Remainers voting tactically for the Liberal Democrats.
Spent the past 15 years analysing what voters are saying.
The Liberal Democrats have the best chance to win seats from the Conservatives, keeping them from a majority.
But only if enough Labour supporters back the Lib Dems this time.
This General Election is going to be a memorable one.
You know from previous elections that a vote for anyone other the Liberal Democrats can end up with an MP who backs Brexit.

nonPolicyAttributes.employment: Election analyst and founder of PoliticalBetting.com
